auto-save-rate.name: Auto-save
auto-save-rate.description: Automatically saves the level in the editor at the specified rate, as well as creates a backup. The backups created by autosave get automatically deleted after 3 new ones have been created to avoid using too much disk space

quick-save.name: Quick Save
quick-save.description: Makes level saving faster by saving to a backup file rather than directly to the save file

mouse-move-on-zoom.name: Zoom Towards Cursor
mouse-move-on-zoom.description: When enabled and while holding down the CTRL key, zooming in the editor with the scroll wheel will be zoomed toward the cursor and not the center of the screen

pinch-to-zoom.name: Pinch to Zoom
pinch-to-zoom.description: When enabled, you can use two fingers to zoom

show-zoom-text.name: Show Zoom Text
show-zoom-text.description: When enabled, flashes the current zoom level as text when you zoom in / out in the editor

scale-factor.name: Scale Factor
scale-factor.description: The factor the UI should be scaled by. <cr>Requires re-entering the editor!</c>

scale-pause.name: Scale Pause Menu
scale-pause.description: Whether the editor pause menu should be scaled according to the scale factor aswell

scale-build-tabs.name: Scale Build Tabs
scale-build-tabs.description: Whether the tabs above the object selection area should be scaled according to the scale factor aswell

better-font-select.name: New Font Selection Menu
better-font-select.description: Replaces the old font select screen with a better one with scrolling

new-edit-menu.name: New Edit Menu
new-edit-menu.description: Changes the object moving menu to have the move button grouped directionally rather than in a list. <cr>Requires re-entering the editor!</c>

view-menu.name: Show View Tab
view-menu.description: Adds a new fourth tab to the editor with buttons from quickly toggling on/off the visibility of features

new-color-menu.name: New Color Menu
new-color-menu.description: Changes the object color selection menu to show more channels aswell as previews for colors and special colors

larger-color-menu.name: Larger Color Menu
larger-color-menu.description: If you're using the <cr>New Color Menu</c>, this makes the color channel buttons a bit larger

hide-trigger-ui.name: Hide Trigger Backgrounds
hide-trigger-ui.description: Hides the <cc>backgrounds</c> on all triggers when using sliders, like with <cl>shader</c> triggers

grid-size-controls.name: Show Grid Size Controls
grid-size-controls.description: Shows controls in the UI for adjusting the size of the grid. <cr>Requires re-entering the editor!</c>

show-grid-on-size-change.name: Show Grid on Size Change
show-grid-on-size-change.description: If the grid is currently hidden and you use the controls to change its size, its toggled on

copy-paste-from-clipboard.name: Copy & Paste to Clipboard
copy-paste-from-clipboard.description: Copy & paste objects to/from system clipboard. This means that when you copy objects, you can paste it in a text editor in its text representation, and also paste it in to the editor later

dev-mode.name: Developer Mode
dev-mode.description: Enables some features intended for Developers

pro-section.name: Supporter Settings
pro-section.description: These settings are for features only available to <cp>Supporters</c>. Support BetterEdit to get access!

trigger-indicator-colors.name: Trigger Indicators: Dynamic Colors
trigger-indicator-colors.description: Control whether <cj>Trigger Indicators</c> should be colored based on the trigger, or if they should just be white

trigger-indicators-color-objects.name: Trigger Indicators: Color Selection
trigger-indicators-color-objects.description: Control whether <cj>Trigger Indicators</c> should also color the target objects, or only point to them via the line

trigger-indicators-blocky.name: Trigger Indicators: Blocky Lines
trigger-indicators-blocky.description: Control whether <cj>Trigger Indicators</c> should draw a direct line to the target objects, or a blocky line that only takes 90-degree turns

wip-section.name: WIP Features
wip-section.description: These settings are for features that are currently Work-In-Progress. This means that <cr>these features may be unstable and unusable</c>, and are only included for testing purposes. <ca>Developer Mode</c> is required to enable them.

better-select.name: Better Warp Selection (WIP)
better-select.enable-if-description: This Feature is Supporter-Only & Heavily WIP!

enable-pro-ui.name: Enable Pro UI
enable-pro-ui.description: Give the Editor a <cy>New Look</c>! <cr>THIS FEATURE IS HEAVILY WIP</c>
enable-pro-ui.enable-if-description: This Feature is Supporter-Only & Heavily WIP!
